original_text: So we must be careful ourselves! Those people did not trust God. As a result, they never arrived in God's special place. So we must be careful ourselves! Those people did not trust God. As a result, they never arrived in God's special place.
korean_text: 이로 보건대 그들이 믿지 아니하므로 능히 들어가지 못한 것이라

sentences.original_text: So we must be careful ourselves!
Those people did not trust God.
they never arrived in God's special place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님의 특별한 곳에 결코 도착하지 못했습니다.

sentences.original_text: So we must be careful ourselves!
Those people did not trust God.
they never arrived in God's special place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님의 특별한 곳에 결코 도착하지 못했습니다.
